mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event( event_num, event_name, event_content, event_filename, event_start, event_end ) VALUES ( event_seq.nextval, #{event_name}, #{event_content}, #{event_filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{event_start}, #{event_end})
INSERT INTO notice_board ( nb_num, nb_title, nb_content, nb_filename, mem_num ) VALUES ( notice_board_seq.nextval, #{nb_title}, #{nb_content}, #{nb_filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mem_num} )
